caption:
@beaub #BeausValentine 
''You sound very beautiful just by the start of this letter''
''You made my day day''
''You sound very sweet''
''I hope you get the best out of life''
''Thank you for all''
Two months ago my dream came true. You read my letter. I'll never forget that night, I'll never forget your beautiful words and I'll never forget the way you said my name. 
Now my next goal is to hug you, and one day I'll make it happen. I promise.
I love you, Happy Valentines Day Beau❤ 
Forever yours, Lucrezia 

P.S. I did this edit to say that I'll always be here for you, I don't want your money, cause you make me happy everyday and that's enough for me. Once again,Happy Valentines Day Beau, and thank you for all
song_album: Set This World On Fire - Single
